items.text: back of a length on leg, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball, on leg, and flicked off his hips to fine leg
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball, on off, and tapped to point. Mushi wants a single, but Shakib says no
items.shortText: Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: through him! A bit of late inswing this time. Length ball snaking in from around the wicket, and very nearly clipped the top of off
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full, on off, and driven with the bat's closed face down the ground. Races away to the long-on boundary
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on off, and flicked to the leg side
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and guided off the back foot to third man for one
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and cut square off the back foot
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: runs this down to third man for a single
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle, and pulled along the ground to fine leg
items.shortText: Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he gloves a shot to third man
items.postText: Seth Miller: "If we apply the double score after 30 over rule then BD would be getting 400+ !!!"
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: cries of catch it but drops well short of fine leg. Top-edges a pull on this occasion
items.shortText: Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, outside off, and cut to point
items.postText: rubaiath tashfi: "Love to read all messages "
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle, and he check-pulls along the ground. Pierces the gap between the two outfielders on the leg side, but the fielders manage to stop the ball from going for four
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length, outside leg stump, and going through to the keeper
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.text: length ball, on leg, and the ball hits his handle and runs down towards short fine leg
items.postText: Kashif: "Seth Miller if you applied that yesterday to the Pakistan-England ODI England would've got over 500!! Some team has to cross the 500 mark during the WC."
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, on off, and defended towards the off side. Gentle hands, they pinch a run
items.shortText: Dockrell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and tapped with soft hands towards point
items.postText: TQ: "Bangladesh have been chasing this whole series. They are playing with the right mindset when chasing. Be interesting to see if Windies win the toss on friday and put bangladesh to bat first as they have not been tested on that front"
items.shortText: Dockrell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up, on off, and defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Dockrell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball, wide enough outside off for Mushfiqur to free his arms. Cut to deep point
items.shortText: Dockrell to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, on off, and he flat-bats a pull. Straight back to the bowler
items.postText: Dockrell in a bit of pain after stopping the previous ball
items.shortText: Dockrell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and he carves a cut shot behind point. Man in the deep is just a spectator
items.postText: sri: "ireland need to to improve bowling,fielding,captainship skills" -- Bowling, captaincy and batting (in that order), I feel. Haven't seen too many new/fresh ideas from Porterfield today
items.shortText: Dockrell to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length, just outside off, and Mushfiqur sways away from the ball's line
items.shortText: Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball, on middle, and going down the leg side
items.shortText: Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide
